alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 2:57PM EDT until July 26 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Fulton County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 256 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wauseon, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wauseon, Archbold, Swanton, Delta, Metamora, Oakshade, Tedrow, Brailey, Pettisville, Winameg, Ottokee, and Assumption. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
